citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:29 pm on Tuesday
August 12, 2025. After arrival to the facility premise the inspector contacted the licensee by phone at 1:29 pm and was
informed by the licensee that there was no available person for inspection until after 5:30pm.. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:29 pm on Tuesday 
August 12, 2025. After arrival to the facility premise the inspector contacted the licensee by phone at 1:29 pm and was 
informed by the licensee that there was no available person for inspection until after 5:30pm.. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
